title: Calories in English Cucumber
meta_description: Discover calories in english cucumber, including macros like carbs, fiber, protein, and fat per serving, plus tweaks and FAQs for better nutrition tracking.
assumptions: One medium English cucumber (~300 g), raw, unpeeled, with skin and seeds (though English cucumbers are often seedless).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, growing conditions, and freshness; values are approximate. Check produce labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium English cucumber provides about 45 kcal, low in calories with high water content for hydration.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged foods.

faqs.q: How many calories in one english cucumber?
faqs.a: About 45 kcal for a medium 300 g English cucumber.
Yes, ~10.8 g carbs per medium cucumber, mostly from natural sugars and fiber.

faqs.q: What's the protein in english cucumber?
faqs.a: Minimal at ~2.1 g per medium cucumber; it's not a significant protein source.
Yes, about 3 g of dietary fiber per medium cucumber, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: How does english cucumber compare to regular cucumber calories?
faqs.a: Similar; both are ~15 kcal per 100 g, but English are longer and often lower in seeds.
